Class

Class TableManager

  • java.lang.Object
    • Class.TableManager

  • public class TableManager
extends java.lang.Object
    TableManager Class that will managed the tables that the restaurant had It will perform function like free table, printing available tables and setting table to occupied
    Since:
    2019-04-12
    Version:
    1.0
    Author:
    Jess Tan Jing Yi

    • Field Summary

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field and Description
      (package private) static java.util.ArrayList<Table> tableList
      ArrayList of table it will be static because there should only be 1 set of tablelist

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor and Description
      TableManager()
      TableManager constructor it will load the table.dat file when it is created

    • Method Summary

      All Methods Static Methods Instance Methods Concrete Methods 
      Modifier and Type Method and Description
      boolean checkTableAvail(int pax)
      Checks if table is available for today, based on pax size Loops through tableList if table status is 'Unoccupied' and the table is able to accommodate to pax's size set available = true Returns available (boolean) true = table is available false = table is not available
      void freeTable(int id)
      Set table status of that tableID as 'Unoccupied'

      Method overloading get the available table based on the pax and TableList for different days

      Transform the ArrayList into List string for printing With table status list of 'Occupied' and 'Unoccupied'

      Transform the ArrayList into List string for printing Instead of showing status 'Occupied' for table, show status of 'Unpaid' since it is already an active order

      • GetStringArrayF

        public java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.String>> GetStringArrayF(java.util.ArrayList<Table> tabList)
        Transform the ArrayList into List string for printing With table status list of 'Occupied' and 'Unoccupied'
        Parameters:
        tabList - ArrayList of tables
        Returns:
        t2Rows an object of the specified arraylist

      • printListTableItem

        public void printListTableItem(java.util.ArrayList<Table> tableLists,
                               int type)
        Prints the Table List with the following headers Table ID, Status, Capacity
        Parameters:
        tableLists - ArrayList of tables
        type - - Type 1 is for inactive orders (No order for the table yet) - Type 2 are for active orders (Orders that have been taken by the staff)

      • GetStringArrayU

        public static java.util.List<java.util.List<java.lang.String>> GetStringArrayU(java.util.ArrayList<Table> tabList)
        Transform the ArrayList into List string for printing Instead of showing status 'Occupied' for table, show status of 'Unpaid' since it is already an active order
        Parameters:
        tabList - ArrayList of tables
        Returns:
        t2Rows (List(String)) of table details

      • getAvailableTables

        public java.util.ArrayList<Table> getAvailableTables(int pax)
        Method overloading get the available tables based on the pax
        Parameters:
        pax - the total customer pax
        Returns:
        AvailtableList a list of tables

      • getAvailableTables

        public java.util.ArrayList<Table> getAvailableTables(int pax,
                                                     java.util.ArrayList<Table> newTable)
        Method overloading get the available table based on the pax and TableList for different days
        Parameters:
        pax - total customer pax
        newTable - arraylist of tables
        Returns:
        AvailtableList a list of tables

      • setReservedTable

        public java.util.ArrayList<Table> setReservedTable()
        Sets reserved table for that day. Checks current session based on current time. Loops through reservation list If the session and date of that row in the list is the same as current date and time, get table ID of that reservation loops through list of table. if same table ID, sets that table's status as 'Reserved' Returns tableList (list of table)
        Returns:
        tableList ArrayList of tables

      • checkTableAvail

        public boolean checkTableAvail(int pax)
        Checks if table is available for today, based on pax size Loops through tableList if table status is 'Unoccupied' and the table is able to accommodate to pax's size set available = true Returns available (boolean) true = table is available false = table is not available
        Parameters:
        pax - Total no of customer pax
        Returns:
        available True = Table Available , False = Table Unavailable

      • printUnpaidTable

        public boolean printUnpaidTable()
        Checks for occupied tables. If exists an occupied table, there is an order and it will return hasOrder == true. Else, it will print error message and return hasOrder == false.
        Returns:
        hasOrder returns true or false if the table has order or not

      • setTableOcc

        public void setTableOcc(int id)
        Set table status of that tableID as 'Occupied'
        Parameters:
        id - return a tableID with status occupied

      • freeTable

        public void freeTable(int id)
        Set table status of that tableID as 'Unoccupied'
        Parameters:
        id - table ID return tableID with status unoccupied
